articles.author: Dawn Chmielewski, Krystal Hu
articles.description: Walt Disney (DIS.N) has created a task force to study artificial intelligence and how it can be applied across the entertainment conglomerate, even as Hollywood writers and actors battle to limit the industry's exploitation of the technology.
articles.title: Disney creates task force to explore AI and cut costs - sources

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Li Auto (2015.HK) said it aimed to outsell BMW (BMWG.DE), Mercedes-Benz (MBGn.DE) and Audi in China in 2024 as the up and coming Chinese automaker accelerates rollouts of new models and ramps up production.
articles.title: China's Li Auto aims to outsell BMW, Mercedes, Audi in its home market in 2024

articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.description: Two U.S. lawmakers on Tuesday asked the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to address questions about potential security concerns involving cellular modules made by Chinese companies including Quectel (603236.SS) and Fibocom Wireless (300638.SZ).
articles.title: Two US lawmakers raise security concerns about Chinese cellular modules

articles.author: Karen Freifeld, David Shepardson
articles.description: The White House on Wednesday will detail its plans to prohibit some U.S. investments in sensitive technology in China, and require that the government be notified of other investments, a senior government source told Reuters.
articles.title: White House to detail plans restricting some US investments in China - source

articles.author: Kevin Buckland
articles.description: The dollar remained on the front foot in Asia on Wednesday, holding on to overnight gains against major peers as investors sought the safety of the currency amid risks from a floundering Chinese economy and downgrades for U.S. banks.
articles.title: Dollar firm on safe-haven demand as markets fret over China, banks

articles.author: Echo Wang, Anirban Sen
articles.description: Amazon.com (AMZN.O) is in talks about joining other technology companies as a cornerstone investor in SoftBank Group Corp's (9984.T) Arm Ltd ahead of its initial public offering (IPO), people familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.
articles.title: Exclusive: Amazon in talks to become anchor investor in Arm ahead of IPO

articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.description: United Auto Workers (UAW) union President Shawn Fain angrily tossed contract proposals from Stellantis (STLAM.MI) in a trash can on Tuesday, citing numerous concessions that the Chrysler parent is seeking in labor talks.
articles.title: UAW calls Stellantis contract offer 'trash'

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: China's consumer prices fell into deflation in July, while factory gate prices extended their declines, as the world's second-largest economy struggled to revive demand and pressure mounted for authorities to release more direct stimulus.
articles.title: China swings into deflation as recovery falters

articles.author: Sarah N. Lynch
articles.description: A federal judge presiding over former President Donald Trump's trial on charges of trying to overturn the 2020 election has ordered his attorneys and federal prosecutors to appear in court on Friday for a hearing to help determine how evidence can be used and shared in the case.
articles.title: US judge sets hearing on evidence in Trump's 2020 election case

articles.author: Ben Blanchard
articles.description: Taiwan chipmaker TSMC's (2330.TW) 3.5 billion euros ($3.83 billion) investment in Germany will drive deeper engagement between the island and Europe, Taiwan's economy minister said on Wednesday, pitching the political benefits of the deal.
articles.title: Taiwan pitches deeper Europe engagement after TSMC Germany investment
